list.name: principal
list.description: a tamagotchi with moral dilemmas. would you let your pet pull the lever!? how will this affect their development!?

list.name: botsbotsbots
list.description: a reverse turing test set in a post-apocalyptic chatroom. 4 bots, 1 human (you). blend in to survive.

list.name: dango
list.description: ai pair programmer powered by a living design doc. informed by need-finding with creative coders.

list.name: tensor trust
list.description: hack a bank by sweet-talking and jailbreaking its ai. published dataset & benchmarks at ICLR'24.

list.name: univers(ity)
list.description: you're a university student in space over holiday break.

list.name: drip or drown
list.description: ai can and will roast your style.

list.name: ezcv
list.description: the easiest resume maker you'll ever use. just add plaintext.

list.name: boba
list.description: drink boba... efficiently? a boba-themed puzzle game.

list.name: coffeelings
list.description: a mood tracking & journaling chrome extension. (200k+ daily active users on chrome web store)

list.name: ashes to ash
list.description: 72-hour ludum dare platformer about collecting emotions.

list.name: slice of scythe
list.description: 72-hour ludum dare game about doing chores (and collecting souls!?) as a grim reaper.

list.name: kittyclinic
list.description: do research. treat patients. eat catnip. repeat.

list.name: spacebar
list.description: endless-runner typing game. explore planets. if you type fast enough, you won't fall into endless void.
